forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of snow between 8am and 3pm, then a chance of rain and snow. Cloudy. High near 39, with temperatures falling to around 36 in the afternoon. East northeast wind around 3 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of snow before 8pm, then a chance of rain between 8pm and 9pm, then a chance of snow between 9pm and 11pm, then a chance of rain between 11pm and 1am. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 28. North northeast wind around 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.
